2015

I participated partly in Amazon Picking Challenge.

2013

I was part of the team developing the iOS version of the Saar Uni App (iOS) during the software engineering course at Saarland University.

I was involved in the research of improving text entry on mobile devices, together with the team, we developed the KALQ Keyboard (Android).
